anya-e0105n:262_2: Tadā pana tesu ussiliyātisso nāma mahāthero vohārakatissarājakāle vetullavādīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kataniggahaṃ

anya-e0105n:262_7: Tesampi vādo pacchā mahāsenarājakāle jetavanavihāre patthari nikāya 13- piṭṭhe.
anya-e0105n:264_0: Goṭhābhayo pana rājā pañcasu mahāvihāra, cetiya,

anya-e0105n:264_4: abuddhabhāsitabhāvaṃ ñatvā taṃvādino saṭṭhi pāpabhikkhū lakkhaṇāhate katvā raṭṭhato pabbājesi,
anya-e0105n:264_5: vetullapotthakāni ca jhāpetvā buddhasāsanaṃ jotesi mahāvaṃse 36, 111- 112- gāthāsu,
anya-e0105n:265_0: Tadā raṭṭhato pabbājitesu tesu bhikkhūsu keci kāvīrapaṭṭanaṃ gantvā tattha vasanti.
anya-e0105n:265_1: Tasmiñca samaye eko aññatitthiyamāṇavako desantarato kāvīramāgantvā paṭṭanagāmikehi tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0105n:265_2: katūpahāraṃ disvā lābhasakkāraṃ nissāya tesaṃ santike pabbajitvā saṅghamittoti nāmena pākaṭo ahosi.
anya-e0105n:265_3: So mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ dhammavinicchayaṃ nissāya goṭhābhayaraññā vetullavādahetu tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ raṭṭhā
anya-e0105n:265_4: pabbājitabhāvaṃ ñatvā mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ kuddho hutvā “vetullavādaṃ vā ne gāhāpessāmi,

anya-e0105n:266_3: tassa sataṃ daṇḍo”ti rañño āṇāya nagare bheriṃ carāpesi.
anya-e0105n:266_4: Tadā mahāvihāravāsino nagare piṇḍāya carantā tayo divase bhikkhamaladdhā mahāpāsāde sannipatitvā “sace mayaṃ khudāhetu adhammaṃ dhammoti gaṇheyyāma,
anya-e0105n:266_5: bahū janā taṃ gahetvā apāyagāmino bhavissanti,

anya-e0105n:282_2: Mahāvihāravāsino bhikkhū taṃ nivāretuṃ asakkontā punapi tato apakkamiṃsu.

anya-e0105n:286_3: Apica dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhe samuddasamīpe guntājanapade nāgārajunakoṇḍaṃ nāma ṭhānamatthi,

anya-e0105n:287_2: buddhavassabbhantare) theravādato bhinnesu ekādasasu gaṇesu sabbatthivādagaṇe pariyāpanno,

anya-e0105n:287_8: Tasmā “ācariyabuddhaghoso tesaṃ nayaṃ jānantoyeva attano ganthesu nikāyantarasamayehi asammissanatthaṃ nappakāsesī”ti veditabbaṃ.

anya-e0105n:288_3: Tathāpi “ācariyabuddhaghoso bodhimaṇḍasamīpe jāto”ti etaṃ pana atthaṃ sādhetuṃ daḷhakāraṇaṃ na dissateva ṭhapetvā taṃ mahāvaṃsavacanaṃ,
anya-e0105n:288_5: tampi mahāvaṃsameva nissāya vuttavacanattā na daḷhakāraṇaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0105n:290_0: Ekacce pana marammaraṭṭhikā “ācariyabuddhaghoso marammaraṭṭhe sathuṃ nāma nagarato sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā saṅgahaṭṭhakathāyo akāsī”ti vadanti.
anya-e0105n:290_3: telaṅgajātikā ca bahū janā marammaraṭṭhe ca indocina raṭṭhe ca gantvā vasanti, talhiṅa?
anya-e0105n:290_4: Iti vohāro ca tatoyeva telaṅgapadato uppanno.
anya-e0105n:290_5: Tathā ‘buddhaghoso aṭṭhakathāyo katvā sīhaḷadīpato marammaraṭṭhaṃ gantvā pacchimabhāge tattheva vasī’tipi gahetuṃ sakkā,
anya-e0105n:290_6: tassa hi ganthā marammaraṭṭhe sīhaḷaraṭṭhatopi surakkhitatarā hontī”ti ca vatvā patiṭṭhāpitaṃ.

anya-e0105n:292_10: Khuddakanikāyapariyāpannaudānādipāḷiyā saṃvaṇṇanābhūtāya paramatthadīpaniyā kārako ācariyadhammapālattheropi dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhe kañcipurajātiko.
anya-e0105n:295_0: Ettha ca kañcipuraṃ nāma madarasanagarassa īsakaṃ pacchimanissite dakkhiṇadisābhāge pañcacattālīsamilappamāṇe
anya-e0105n:298_0: Pubbe mayūradūta mayūrarūpa (sī.), mayūrasutta (syā.) paṭṭanamhi saddhiṃ vasantenā”ti – vuttaṃ.
anya-e0105n:299_0: Ettha ca mayūradūtapaṭṭanaṃ nāma idāni madarasanagarasamīpe milapora iti voharitaṭṭhānanti porāṇappavattigavesīhi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0105n:300_0: Imāhi pana nigamanagāthāhi dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭheyeva nivutthapubbataṃ pakāseti,
anya-e0105n:300_2: marammaraṭṭhe vā nivutthapubbatāya pakāsanañca na dissati.
anya-e0105n:300_3: Tena ācariyabuddhaghoso dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhiko na hotīti na sakkā paṭikkhipituṃ.
anya-e0105n:302_0: “Yaṃ pana andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘aparikkhitte pamukhe anāpattīti bhūmiyaṃ vinā jagatiyā pamukhaṃ sandhāya kathita’nti vuttaṃ,

anya-e0105n:303_0: Iminā pana vacanena “andhakaṭṭhakathā andhakaraṭṭhikehi therehi katā”ti pākaṭā hoti,

anya-e0105n:304_2: Ettha ca kheṭoti padassa gāmoti vā,
anya-e0105n:304_4: khuddakanagaranti vā tayo atthā sakkatābhidhāne pakāsitā,
anya-e0105n:304_5: dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhesu ca yāvajjatanāpi gāmo kheḍāti voharīyati.

anya-e0105n:304_9: Idāni pana dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhe guntājanapade nāgārajunakoṇḍato ekapaṇṇāsamilamatte (51) amaravatito

anya-e0105n:304_15: Yasmā panetaṃ “moraṇḍakheṭakavattabbenā”ti padaṃ “moraṇḍagāmajātenā”ti padaṃ viya pāḷinayānucchavikaṃ na hoti,

anya-e0105n:305_1: ca vuttavacanesu pacchimameva balavataraṃ hoti ācariyasseva vacananissitattā,
anya-e0105n:305_2: tasmā tadeva nissāya ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa uppatti evaṃ veditabbā.

anya-e0105n:307_5: So evaṃ piṭakattayapāḷimuggaṇhantoyeva aññāsi “ayamekāyanamaggo dassanavisuddhiyā nibbānasacchikiriyāyā”ti.

anya-e0105n:308_0: So evaṃ piṭakattayapāḷimuggaṇhitvā madarasa nagarasamīpaṭṭhānabhūte mayūradūtapaṭṭanamhi ca kañcipurādīsu

anya-e0105n:309_0: Ekacce pana ādhunikā vicakkhaṇā evaṃ vadanti “ācariyabuddhaghosassa sīhaḷadīpāgamanena sirimeghavaṇṇarājakālato (846- bu-

anya-e0105n:315_0: Iminā pana aṭṭhakathāvacanena mahāaṭṭhakathādīnaṃ tissannaṃyeva aṭṭhakathānaṃ sutabhāvo dassito.

anya-e0105n:315_6: Tathā hi vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ ganthārambhasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vijira. ṭī.
anya-e0105n:315_13: samantapāsādikāyañca cūḷapaccarīti nāmaṃ kuhiñcipi na dissati,

anya-e0105n:315_15: bahūsu ca ṭhānesu “saṅkhepaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mahāpaccariyañca vutta”ntiādinā pārā. aṭṭha.
anya-e0105n:315_17: Tasmā vajirabuddhiyaṃ cūḷapaccarīti vuttaṭṭhakathā mahāpaccarito uddharitvā saṅkhepena kataṭṭhakathā bhaveyya,

anya-e0105n:315_19: Evañca sati mahāpaccariyā sutāya sāpi sutāyeva hotīti na sā ācariyena sutāti veditabbā.

anya-e0105n:318_5: Paññāveyyattiyasamannāgatoti padena ācariyabuddhaghosatthero porāṇaṭṭhakathāyo saṅkhipituñca paṭisaṅkharituñca samatthoti dīpetīti veditabbo.

anya-e0105n:320_4: tathā porāṇaṃ pāḷipiṭakameva uggaṇhanti ceva vācenti ca,

anya-e0105n:320_12: Abhayagirivāsino pana vaṭṭagāmaṇirājakālato paṭṭhāya sakkatabhāsāropitaṃ dhammarucinikāyādipiṭakampi

anya-e0105n:322_0: Tesu tāva visuddhimaggaṃ ācariyabuddhaghoso saṅghapālattherena ajjhesito mahāvihārassa dakkhiṇabhāge padhānaghare mahānigamassāmino pāsāde pari. aṭṭha.

anya-e0105n:323_1: Tattha kimatthaṃ katoti etassa pana pañhassa attho ācariyeneva pakāsito. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0105n:330_0: Visuddhimaggaṃ bhāsissaṃ, taṃ me sakkacca bhāsato;
anya-e0105n:332_0: Tasmā esa visuddhimaggo visuddhisaṅkhātanibbānakāmānaṃ sādhujanānaṃ sīlasamādhipaññāsaṅkhātassa visuddhimaggassa
anya-e0105n:332_2: Appadhānappayojanavasena pana catūsu āgamaṭṭhakathāsu ganthasallahukabhāvatthāyapi katoti veditabbo.
anya-e0105n:335_0: Icceva me kato”ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.ganthārambhakathā.
anya-e0105n:337_0: Kiṃ nissāya katoti etassapi pañhassa attho ācariyeneva pakāsito. Vuttañhi ettha ganthārambhe –
anya-e0105n:343_0: Sabbasaṅkaradosehi, mutto yasmā pakāsito”ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.ganthārambhakathā.
anya-e0105n:344_0: Iminā pana vacanena ayamattho pākaṭo hoti –
anya-e0105n:344_1: “visuddhimaggaṃ kurumāno ācariyo mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ desanānayasaṅkhātā pañcannampi nikāyānaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāyo
anya-e0105n:344_2: nissāya tāsu vuttaṃ gahetabbaṃ sabbaṃ vinicchayaṃ samāharitvā akāsī”ti.
anya-e0105n:344_3: Tasmā yā yā ettha padavaṇṇanā vā vinicchayo vā sādhakavatthu vā dassīyati,
anya-e0105n:344_4: taṃ sabbaṃ tassa tassa niddhāritapāḷipadassanikāyasaṃvaṇṇanābhūtāya porāṇasīhaḷaṭṭhakathāto ānetvā bhāsāparivattanavaseneva dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0105n:344_5: Ayampi hi visuddhimaggo na kevalaṃ attano ñāṇappabhāvena kato,
anya-e0105n:344_7: atha kho catunnampi āgamaṭṭhakathānaṃ avayavabhāveneva kato.
anya-e0105n:348_0: Suparimitaparicchinnaṃ, cattālīsasataṃ hotī”tiādi dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.nigamanakathā.

anya-e0105n:352_0: “Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ;

anya-e0105n:495_13: tepi “iminā nāma therenā”ti ekaṃsato dassetuṃ na sakkonti,
anya-e0105n:495_14: tathā dassetuñca lesamattampi sādhakavacanaṃ na dissati.
anya-e0105n:495_15: Tasmā abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyopi idāni ācariyehi cūḷabuddhaghosoti voharitena buddhaghosena nāma bhikkhunāyācito
anya-e0105n:495_16: visuddhimaggavinayāgamaṭṭhakathānaṃ kārako ācariyamahābuddhaghosattheroyeva akāsīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbanti.
anya-e0105n:496_0: Yaṃ pana mahāvaṃse “ācariyabuddhaghoso sīhaḷadīpāgamanato pubbe jambudīpe vasanakāleyeva aṭṭhasāliniṃ akāsī”ti adhippāyena –
anya-e0105n:498_1: taṃ idāni dissamānāya aṭṭhasāliniyā na sameti.
anya-e0105n:498_2: Tattha hi ganthārambheyeva visuddhimaggaṃ atidisitvā pacchāpi so ca,
anya-e0105n:498_4: Tasmā tassā ācariyena sīhaḷadīpaṃ patvā visuddhimaggañceva samantapāsādikañca katvā pacchāyeva katabhāvo ativiya pākaṭoti.
anya-e0105n:500_0: Kaṅkhāvitaraṇiṃ nāma pātimokkhaṭṭhakathaṃ ācariyabuddhaghosatthero soṇattherena yācito mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ
anya-e0105n:500_1: vācanāmagganissitaṃ sīhaḷapātimokkhaṭṭhakathānayaṃ nissāya ekampi padaṃ pāḷiyā vā mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāhi
anya-e0105n:506_0: Vattayissāmi nāmena, kaṅkhāvitaraṇiṃ subha”nti kaṅkhā aṭṭha. ganthārambhakathā ca.
anya-e0105n:509_0: Nissāya sā ayaṃ niṭṭhaṃ, gatā ādāya sabbaso;
anya-e0105n:511_0: Na hettha taṃ padaṃ atthi, yaṃ virujjheyya pāḷiyā;
anya-e0105n:512_0: Mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ, porāṇaṭṭhakathāhi vā”ti kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n:514_0: Aparāpi tisso aṭṭhakathāyo santi khuddakapāṭhaṭṭhakathā dhammapadaṭṭhakathā suttanipātaṭṭhakathā cāti,
anya-e0105n:514_1: yā tāsu dissamānanigamanavasena ācariyabuddhaghoseneva katāti paññāyanti.
anya-e0105n:514_2: Tattha pana vuttavacanāni kānici kānici āgamaṭṭhakathāsu vuttākārena na honti.
anya-e0105n:514_5: pacchā ācariyena osānasodhanavasena pariyosāpitā vā bhaveyyuṃ,
anya-e0105n:514_6: abhidhammaṭṭhakathaṃ āyācantena cūḷabuddhaghosena vā katā bhaveyyu”nti vadanti.
anya-e0105n:515_0: Taṃ tathā vā hotu aññathā vā,
anya-e0105n:515_3: Tāsu hi dhammapadaṭṭhakathaṃ kumārakassapattherena āyācito sirikūṭassa (sirikuḍḍassa) rañño pāsāde viharanto
anya-e0105n:515_4: paramparābhataṃ sīhaḷabhāsāya saṇṭhitaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathaṃ pāḷibhāsāya āropetvā vitthāragatañca vacanakkamaṃ
anya-e0105n:522_0: Gāthānaṃ byañjanapadaṃ, yaṃ tattha na vibhāvitaṃ;
anya-e0105n:523_0: Kevalaṃ taṃ vibhāvetvā, sesaṃ tameva atthato.
anya-e0105n:527_0: Pāsāde sirikūṭassa, rañño viharatā mayā”ti dha. pa. aṭṭha. 2.nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n:528_0: Ettha ca sirikūṭo nāma samantapāsādikānigamane siripāloti vutto mahānāmoyeva rājāti vadanti.
anya-e0105n:528_1: Evaṃ sati mahesiyā ānayanaṃ samādāpanamārabbha tena raññā dinne dhūmarakkhapabbatavihāre vasantena sā katāti veditabbā.
anya-e0105n:535_0: Tassa pana rañño kāle sā niṭṭhāpitāti na sakkā gahetuṃ.
anya-e0105n:535_1: Tassa hi rañño ekavīsatimavasse samantapāsādikaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0105n:535_3: Etthantare sādhikaekavassena “catasso ca āgamaṭṭhakathāyo tisso ca abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyo ayañca dhammapadaṭṭhakathā”ti
anya-e0105n:537_0: Paramatthajotikaṃ nāma khuddakapāṭhassa ceva suttanipātassa ca aṭṭhakathaṃ kenacipi anāyācito attano icchāvaseneva akāsi.
anya-e0105n:543_0: Tatheva ca ṭhitaṃ yasmā, navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ.
anya-e0105n:548_0: Bahū pana vicakkhaṇā imā ārambhagāthāyo vicinitvā “netaṃ ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa viya vacanaṃ hotī”ti vadanti.
anya-e0105n:548_2: ācariyabuddhaghoso hi yaṃ kañci ganthaṃ sīlādiguṇasampannena aññena āyācitova karoti,
anya-e0105n:548_4: Punapi ācariyo “porāṇasīhaḷaṭṭhakathaṃ bhāsāparivattanavasena karissāmī”ti ca “mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vācanāmaggaṃ
anya-e0105n:548_5: nissāya karissāmī”ti ca evaṃ paṭiññaṃ katvāva karoti,
anya-e0105n:548_7: Punapi ācariyo atigambhīratthānaṃ catunnañcāgamānaṃ abhidhammassa ca saṃvaṇṇanārambhepi dukkarabhāvaṃ na katheti,
anya-e0105n:548_8: idha pana “sāsanaṃ abodhantena mādisenā”ti attanā sāsanassa abuddhabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā “atidukkarā”ti ca katheti.
anya-e0105n:548_11: ācariyo hi attano ganthanigamanesu “tipiṭakapariyattippabhede sāṭṭhakathe satthusāsane appaṭihatañāṇappabhāvenā”ti attano ñāṇappabhāvaṃ pakāsesi,
anya-e0105n:548_12: so “sāsanaṃ abodhantena mādisena atidukkarā”ti īdisaṃ vacanaṃ na katheyyayevāti.
anya-e0105n:550_2: Sā pana atthadassittherena ca buddhamittattherena ca mahisāsakanikāyikena ca buddhadevattherenāti tīhi
anya-e0105n:550_3: therehi abhiyācito mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vācanāmaggaṃ nissāya katā.
anya-e0105n:560_0: Bhāsissaṃ bhāsato taṃ me, sādhu gaṇhantu sādhavo”ti.
anya-e0105n:561_0: Ettāvatā ca ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa ganthabhāvena pākaṭāhi sabbaṭṭhakathāhi saha visuddhimaggassa karaṇappakāro vitthārena vibhāvito hoti.
anya-e0105n:563_10: pasādanīyānaṃ diṭṭhānugatāpādanasamatthānaṃ vatthūnañca dīpanatoti evamādīhi anekasatehi guṇehi esa sakalaloke patthaṭo jāto.
anya-e0105n:564_3: Saparivāraṃ sikkhattayañca ettha paripuṇṇameva saṅgahetvā dassitaṃ.
anya-e0105n:571_0: Iti pana sabbaṃ yasmā, visuddhimagge mayā suparisuddhaṃ;
anya-e0105n:572_0: Vuttaṃ tasmā bhiyyo, na taṃ idha vicārayissāmī”ti.
anya-e0105n:573_0: Yasmā pana visuddhimaggo catunnaṃ āgamaṭṭhakathānaṃ avayavabhāvena kato,
anya-e0105n:573_1: tasmā tā viya porāṇasīhaḷaṭṭhakathānaṃ bhāsāparivattanavasena ceva punappunāgatamatthānaṃ saṃkhipanavasena
anya-e0105n:573_2: ca parasamayavivajjanavasena ca mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ parisuddhavinicchayasaṅkhātassa sakasamayassa dīpanavasena ca kato.
anya-e0105n:578_0: Hitvā punappunāgata-matthaṃ atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.ganthārambhakathā ca.
anya-e0105n:581_0: Icceva kato tasmā, tampi gahetvāna saddhimetāya;
anya-e0105n:582_0: Aṭṭhakathāya vijānatha, dīghāgamanissitaṃ attha”nti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.ganthārambhakathā ca.
anya-e0105n:588_0: Suparimitaparicchinnaṃ, cattālīsaṃ sataṃ hotī”ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n:589_0: Yadi cāyaṃ visuddhimaggo ācariyena āgamaṭṭhakathāyo viya akatvā porāṇasīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo ca anoloketvā kevalaṃ attano ñāṇappabhāveneva kato assa,
anya-e0105n:589_4: kevalaṃ ācariyassa matiyāva kato”ti evameva vattabbo assa.
anya-e0105n:589_5: Yasmā pana tathā akatvā pubbe vuttappakāreneva kato,
anya-e0105n:589_6: tasmā ayampi visuddhimaggo tāsaṃ āgamaṭṭhakathānaṃ karaṇākāreneva katoti ca,
anya-e0105n:590_0: Ekacce pana vicakkhaṇā ācariyabuddhaghosassa ganthesu uttarapakkhasāsanikānaṃ assaghosanāgajjunavasubandhuādīnaṃ
anya-e0105n:590_1: bhikkhūnaṃ viya porāṇaganthe anissāya attano ñāṇeneva takketvā dassitaṃ dhammakathāvisesaṃ adisvā asantuṭṭhacittā
anya-e0105n:590_2: evaṃ vadanti “buddhaghosassa aññaṃ anissāya attano ñāṇappabhāveneva abhinavaganthuppādanaṃ na passāmā”ti.
anya-e0105n:590_3: Taṃ tesaṃ garahāvacanampi samānaṃ theravādīnaṃ pasaṃsāvacanameva sampajjati.
anya-e0105n:590_4: Theravādino hi evaṃ jānanti “buddheneva bhagavatā sammāsambuddhena desetabbo ceva dhammo paññāpetabbo ca vinayo anavasesena desito ceva paññatto ca,
anya-e0105n:590_5: soyeva dhammavinayo saddhāsampannehi bhikkhūhi ceva gahaṭṭhehi ca yathārahaṃ paṭipajjitabbo,
anya-e0105n:590_6: na tato añño dhammavinayo takketvā gavesetabbo.
anya-e0105n:590_7: Yadi pana añño dhammavinayo kenaci takketvā kathito assa,
anya-e0105n:590_8: taṃ tasseva takkino sāsanaṃ hoti na satthu sāsanaṃ.
anya-e0105n:590_9: Yaṃ yaṃ pana bhagavato dhammavinaye padabyañjanaṃ atthato apākaṭaṃ hoti,
anya-e0105n:590_10: tattha tattha porāṇakehi paṭisambhidāchaḷabhiññādiguṇasampannehi bhagavato adhippāyaṃ jānantehi aṭṭhakathācariyehi saṃvaṇṇitanayena attho gahetabbo,
anya-e0105n:603_0: Teneva ācariyo bhagavato dhammavinayaṃ vā porāṇaṭṭhakathaṃ vā anissāya attano ñāṇena takketvā vā attanā
anya-e0105n:603_1: paricitalokiyaganthehi gahetvā vā na kañci ganthaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0105n:603_3: taṃ theravādino mahāpadesasutte dī. ni. 2.188; a. ni.
anya-e0105n:603_4: 4.180 vuttanayena “addhā idaṃ na ceva tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ,
anya-e0105n:603_6: Yato ca kho ayaṃ visuddhimaggo porāṇaṭṭhakathānaṃ bhāsāparivattanādivaseneva ācariyena kato,
anya-e0105n:603_7: tatoyeva theravādino taṃ mahāpadesasutte vuttanayena “addhā idaṃ tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ,
anya-e0105n:604_1: Tathāyaṃ visuddhimaggo suviññeyyapadavākyehi ceva anākulapadavākyehi ca tantinayānurūpāya pāḷigatiyā suṭṭhu saṅkhato,
anya-e0105n:604_3: Tasmā taṃ olokentā viññuno visuddhajjhāsayā khaṇe khaṇe atthapaṭisaṃvedino ceva dhammapaṭisaṃvedino ca hutvā anappakaṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedenti.
anya-e0105n:605_3: Tāni passitvā anussarantānaṃ sappurisānaṃ balavapasādo ca uppajjati,
anya-e0105n:605_4: “kadā nu kho mayampi īdisā bhavissāmā”ti diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjitukāmatā ca uppajjati.
anya-e0105n:606_0: Evaṃ parisuddhapiṭakapāḷinissayatādīhi anekasatehi guṇehi ayaṃ visuddhimaggo sakalaloke patthaṭo jātoti veditabbo.
anya-e0105n:606_2: evaṃ aññāpi ācariyena katā tipiṭakasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyo porāṇaṭṭhakathānaṃ bhāsāparivattanabhāvādīhi guṇehi sakalaloke patthaṭāyeva honti.
anya-e0105n:607_0: Ettāvatā ca pana kimatthaṃ katotiādīnampi pañhānamattho vitthārena vibhāvitova hotīti.
anya-e0105n:793_0: Yaṃ’kāsi, kaṃ nu’dha na rocayate budhaṃ so.
anya-e0105n:803_0: Disvā hi naggharatanaṃ nanu vajjaye na.
anya-e0105n:808_0: Yyogena mettha hi vinā paṭipatti kā’ññā.
anya-e0105n:868_0: Kiṃ yaṃ thiraṃ lahu vinassati duppasayhaṃ.
